# uptimekuma_notification_signal (Resource)

Signal notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_signal" "example" {
  name       = "Signal Notifications"
  url        = "http://signal.example.com:8080"
  number     = "+1234567890"
  recipients = "+9876543210,+1111111111"
  is_active  = true
  is_default = false
}

resource "uptimekuma_notification_signal" "with_single_recipient" {
  name       = "Signal Single Recipient"
  url        = "http://signal.example.com:8080"
  number     = "+1234567890"
  recipients = "+9876543210"
  is_active  = true
  is_default = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Notification name
- `number` (String) Signal bot phone number
- `recipients` (String) Recipient phone numbers (comma-separated)
- `url` (String, Sensitive) Signal API URL

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
